description: Returns all the tags associated with an Amazon Web Services resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that you want tag information on.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array of tags applied to the specified resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for an Amazon Web Services resource tag.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The opaque string that indicates the position to begin the next list of results in the response.
